title: Greater Mana Potion
summaries: The Greater Mana Potion is a potion that restores 200 mana upon use and is only surpassed by the Super Mana Potion in potency of mana restoration items. Unlike most potions, Greater Mana Potions cannot be crafted. Instead, they can be purchased from the Wizard for (Desktop, Console, Mobile and 3DS versions) 5 SC / (Old-gen console version) 10 SC, or dropped by Biome Mimics. On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version and Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, they can additionally be obtained from Golden Crates, but on the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, they cannot be obtained outside of Hardmode.

Equipping a <linked>Mana Flower</linked> lets a player consume any type of mana potion automatically. Consuming any mana-restoring potion will enact the <linked>Mana Sickness</linked> debuff, reducing magic damage for a short duration.
